name: Littlest Pet Shop: Biggest Adventure
description: Enter a great big world of LITTLEST PET SHOP adventures with this TV plug-in game that you plug in to and play on your TV! Adopt and save up to 15 pets at the The Little Lovin' Pet Playhouse! Mix and match ingredients to make them tasty treats! Is your pet feeling icky? Stop by the Get Better Center for a little TLC! Take your pets to the WHIRL AROUND PLAYGROUND to romp and play games with other pets. And when it's time to primp your on-screen pals, take them to the Purr-fection Salon for a bath, a haircut and even take pictures for your album! It's the purr-fect place to make all of your pet-lovin' dreams come true! Includes game controller, exclusive owl pet and instructions.

name: Sonic Frontiers: Sonic’s Birthday Bash
description: Celebrate Sonic’s birthday on the festively decorated Starfall Islands! Spin dash your way to the party with new challenges, moves, collectible Koco, and New Game +!

name: Sonic Dash+
description:
Sonic Dash+ is the advanced edition of Sonic the Hedgehog’s first endless runner, Sonic Dash, that was originally released in 2013.

Sonic Dash+ released for Apple Arcade in 2022 . This updated version do not have microtransactions or ads present in the original game.

name: Sonic Prime Dash
description: Zip through 3D race courses, jump over obstacles and battle iconic villains in this high-octane running game featuring the world's fastest blue hedgehog.

name: Minecraft: Moana Character Pack
description: Minecraft: Moana Character Pack is a skin pack for Minecraft featuring characters from Disney's Moana.

name: Sonic Origins: Premium Fun Pack
description: The Sonic Origins Premium Fun Pack features Hard Missions, Letterbox Background, Bonus Character Animations in-menu & music player, and additional re-mastered music tracks.

name: Sonic Origins Plus: Expansion Pack
description:
For current owners of Sonic Origins, complete your experience with the Plus Expansion Pack, which features 12 Sonic Game Gear titles, playable Knuckles in Sonic CD, and for the first time ever, Amy Rose as a playable character in Sonic the Hedgehog 1, 2, Sonic 3 & Knuckles, and Sonic CD!

This pack also includes the Classic Music Pack and Premium Fun Pack which contain Extreme Missions, Mirror Mode, additional screen borders, new character animations in menus, added music from other Sonic titles, and more!

name: Nemurenu Yoru no Chiisana Ohanashi
description: Children's point-and-click storybook adventure based on the picture book "Short Stories for a Sleepless Night" by Yuko Hara.

name: Cell Bound
description:
Cell Bound is a simple and addictive puzzle matching game.

Link up 5 or more of the same color to cause the cell-like structures to burst and vanish before they can contaminate the whole play area. Burst more chains at a faster rate to score more points.

name: Falldown 3D
description:
Easy to play and really entertaining, Falldown is a fast-paced game where only speed and reflexes matter.
The rule is extremely simple : avoid the shelves, keep the ball bouncing, and get down as far as possible.
Ghost bonus, slow-motion, and multiball bonuses will be here to help!

name: Penthouse Interactive: Virtual Photo Shoot Vol. 1
description: You're a photographer who wants to work for Penthouse. Put together an ideal sexy pictorial for your portfolio and then, if hired, proceed to do the photo-shoot of your life.

name: Peter Frankl: Puzzle no Tou
description: FMV puzzle collection

name: Sekure Fuumin no Omocha Hako
description: Adult FMV photo manipulation game. The player edits gravure images to be judged and ranked against the computer.

name: Fortnite: Sapphire Hagiri Quest Pack
description: The Sapphire Serpent will help Charlotte unlock her true potential. Includes an Outfit w/ style, a Back Bling, 2 Pickaxes, a Wrap and Quests to earn up to 1,500 V-Bucks.

name: Supermodel Gail McKenna
description: FMV 'girlfriend experience' starring English glamour model Gail McKenna. Features a guided tour of London, interview clips, photographs from McKenna's last nude shoot, and a trivia quiz based on McKenna's personal life.

name: Love Spell: The Starlight Update
description:
Complete remaster of the original game in a new engine with overhauled graphics, new music, new content, and more!

After saving the life of a mysterious old woman, a young girl is gifted a magical spell book with the power to make anyone whose name she writes inside of it fall madly in love with her until the next full moon. "Love Spell" is a romantic-comedy otome game full of magic, laughs & cute penguins!

name: Guilty Gear: Strive - Additional Character Color Pack
description: This color pack unlocks colors for the initial roster of 15 characters as well as the 5 characters from Season Pass 1 as they were released, for a total of 20 characters. There are 5 colors for every character, making for 100 extra colors available.

name: Yodoyabashi Oyasama Club
description:
The regular meeting of Kansai's famous "Yodoyabashi Ojousama Club" is about to begin! Fashionable and elegant ladies meeting together! Bursting with femininity, they will dye the mansion bright red!

Will you be able to make it to tea time... alive?

name: Guilty Gear: Strive - Special Colors for Sol and Ky
description:
This early purchase reward unlocked color and effect swapped versions of Sol Badguy and Ky Kiske.

The pack was available for purchases on PlayStation and Steam from release till June 25th and on Xbox from release till April 13th. Physical versions received a single use code while supplies lasted.

name: Malstrum's Mansion
description:
"Something sinister happens every night in a cursed mansion in Vienna. Some years have passed since the second plague epidemic, and you are the only descendant of the Malstrum's family who will dare enter the mansion, and discover what happened in that haunted place."

Malstrum's Mansion is a free, browser-based adventure game inspired by Shadowgate and the other "MacVenture" games by ICOM Simulations. Developed by ACE Team, it was originally drawn and designed in 1989 for a Mac Plus, but it didn't see the light until April 2009, when it was created as a free flash game. The game also serves as a bit of viral marketing for the team's first commercial game, Zeno Clash.

name: The Computer Spiele Museum's Museum Guide
description:
Museum Guide is an advergame made for History Worth Playing, a campaign for the Computer Spiele Museum of Berlin in Germany. The game was written to celebrate the 20th anniversary of the museum and the 35th anniversary of the ZX Spectrum.

The game is set in the museum, where some games have gone missing. The player has to locate the games and bring them back to the correct exhibit. The museum consists of several single-screen rooms connected both horizontally and vertically to offer a large amount of exploration. Items such as discs, boards, and cartridges can be picked up and stored in an inventory with room for four items. There they can be examined and then the player has to find the correct exhibit to put it back. Both items and exhibits have descriptions that can be read for some more information about video game history.

name: Tetris 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Tetris 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Galactic Catch
description: Great for all ages! Play the latest out-of-this-world fishing game from Baobab Studios, 9x Emmy-winning creators of the fan-favorite, "Invasion!"

name: Guilty Gear: Strive - Another Story
description:
This story expansion is exclusive to Season Pass 1.

Another Story provides the player a full look behind the curtain from another perspective featuring appearances from many characters who did not show up during the main story, including Ramlethal, May, and Baiken.

name: Mario's Pride: Mini Quest
description: It’s Pride Month, and a group of crystals called Pix are planning to cancel the Pride Month celebrations for all eternity! Mario must defeat them before it’s too late!

name: Killer Instinct
description: Game Boy port of Killer Instinct.

name: Tetris Plus
description: Sin descripción

name: Mr. Driller
description: A Port for Game Boy Color, Mr. Driller is a real-time puzzle game that relies solely on quick-thinking and a bit of planning. Gameplay is a combination of Tetris and Boulder Dash: You have to drill down through multi-colored blocks to reach the bottom while avoiding the consequences of reckless drilling (blocks may fall on you and crush you).

name: Rayman Raving Rabbids
description: PlayStation 2 port of Rayman Raving Rabbids.

name: Rayman Raving Rabbids
description: Xbox 360 port of Rayman Raving Rabbids.

name: The Amazing Spider-Man
description: The PlayStation Vita port of The Amazing Spider-Man.

name: Mother Fucker Galaxy
description: its a shooting game about my ptsd and other mental illness but largely shooting.

name: Jumping Finn
description: Sin descripción

name: Spanky!
description: Spanky! is THE booty-physics party game that brings cheeky movement mechanics to chaos-filled party modes. Twerk online with up to 7 friends and slap some jiggly tush!

name: Mega Man X: The Red Cartridge
description: The creepypasta game was written by FoxySonicMaster108

name: Pokémon Pesadilla
description: Pokemon Pesadilla is a game hack developed by ReoNeky.

name: Leap in Bootstrap
description: Modify the past, and make the different future!

name: Yudashi Peril: Floraison
description:
The year is 2013, and Homura Asano is trying to get by as a second year at the prestigious Ainami Academy. Up until the beginning of the second semester, she hasn't had much in the way of friends, hasn't participated in any clubs, and has never had a girlfriend. Most of all, she has a strong premonition that she will not live to see her third year. Is it possible to change the course of her life and avert this fate?

Throughout the course of the game, you will be able to raise Homura's stats by choosing different activities and make attempts to get closer to other girls at school in order to forge bonds through route events. While romance plays a significant part in her life and desires, not every route is romantic. Friendship plays just as valuable a role as dating in her story.

name: Kemono Friends: Neko to Wakai se yo
description: A cute action shooter game based on Kemono Friends.

name: Sniper Elite 3: Camouflage Weapons Pack
description:
The Camouflage Weapons pack for Sniper Elite 3 gives stealthy gamers access to a combination of camouflaged and silenced weaponry that can be used across all multiplayer, singleplayer and co-operative game modes.

This DLC pack includes:

Semi-Auto HDM handgun (silenced): a silent, semi-automatic pistol with a high rate of fire and longer range, helping you remain unseen and unheard.

Mosin-Nagant rifle (camouflaged): deadly from a far with improved zoom and stability.

MP44 submachine gun (camouflaged): one of the most accurate side arms available, coupled with its longer range you’ll be able to take your enemy by surprise.

name: Robber
description: Sin descripción

name: Nomad
description: Nomad is a sandbox survival game. Hunt, craft, kill and survive! Find food, drink, weapons, ammo and medical supplies - or craft them! Build a base to protect yourself but also remember to protect the base from raiding players.

name: Global Folktale
description:
In Global Folktale animals have captured the land and humans have retreated to a faraway place. But after years of hiding the time for cowardice is over, as the people stand united and decide to fight back to reclaim what's theirs. Led by Allen, Prince of Zodia Kingdom, players gain control of an eight character party to battle their feral foes in a variety of locations and environments.

Unlike most strategy/RPGs, the combat takes place in real-time with 3D polygonal graphics, while each character is supported by a multitude of customization options, weapons, and items.

name: Age of Time
description: Experimental networking game made to test the Torque Engine, the game focuses on small-server community dynamics in a classic fantasy RPG world. While mostly a personal project, the server continues to run today and players can partake in community driven features like crowd-sourced policing and fair-air bartering.

name: Prince Maker-Braveness
description:
Doujin game, similar to the famous Princess Maker series.

Raise a Prince into one of many different jobs. Different raising tactics lead to different endings.

name: Private: Pornmania
description: Compilation CD-ROM set from FL Studio creators Image-Line. Features "over 1,200MB of hard-core movies for DOS and Windows," in addition to erotic themed games such as Porntris, Memory, Maze, Solver, and 'In the Jungle' which combines gameplay from all these games.

name: SuiSui Sweet
description:
Our third-year protagonist Kosuke is surrounded by unique girls.
His bright and cheerful childhood friend Makoto.
The stoic council president Kyoka.
The cool girl Chiaki.
The flirtatious first year Miho.
And the crazy about adivination Yuubi.
Where will Kosuke's affection lead to...?

name: Book 5 Untold
description:
A free adult game based on "Legend of Korra". Game set on time after Korra opened spirit portal in republic city.

You play as Guru, who is supposed to train Korra to make her achieve Avatar State.

name: The Vamp
description:
A short story about a vampire who breaks into a man's house at night ...
You can play as Yumi (the vampire) or the man.
Your goal: obtain the best grade. But it's not really necessary. You can also get all possible notes, and all endings, for a total of 26 endings.

name: Clover Day's Plus
description:
Bottled-up emotions... An everlasting oath... Heartfelt desires... An enduring regret... And a childhood promise. Yuuto was abandoned by his parents and raised in an orphanage in Britain before a trading merchant by the name of Takakura Yoshiomi adopted him and brought him to Japan.

Clover Day's Plus is the Steam release of the remake of Clover Day's.

name: Zombie Swipeout
description: The undead are leaping for your lobes! Dust off your trusty machete and help Joey, our intrepid hero, show them some manners the Zombie Swipeout way!

name: SpringFling
description:
Have you ever wanted to be a spring? No? Oh, sure you have! Imagine the cool breeze in your face as you fly skyward, avoiding certain death in the cavernous depths below, all while impressing your fans with your high flying springy antics. Fling your way up tree branches, fly through sewers, scale waterfalls, and collect silly hats, all while looking super fly. Kids still say that these days, right?

SpringFling is an engaging and addictive vertical platformer for the iPhone set in the beautifully rendered world of SpringTown. With the flick of a finger, jump as high as you can without plummeting to the bottom, then brag to your Twitter and Facebook friends or envious onlookers.

name: Spider Fox
description: Spider Fox is a game about a Mad Scientist who has combined all animals throughout the land. You play as a Spider Fox who must now save the animals and stop the Mad Scientist.

name: Tiny Jump
description:
Tiny Jump, a simple and fun game. Player control a character jumping between planets, collect items to win high score. Jump angle is important to win high score, and Combo is the key too.

There is many characters in this game, each has a unique advantage, can help players to clear stage, and there is some more characters comming soon.

This game has a cute cartoon graphic, wondful sound effect and music, and Easy control. But, If you want get a high score, you need lots of practise.

name: Guilty Gear: Strive - Additional Battle Stage: Lap of the Kami
description: The additional battle stage "Lap of the Kami" becomes selectable in-game.

name: Guilty Gear: Strive - Additional Battle Stage: White House Reborn
description: The additional battle stage "White House Reborn" becomes selectable in-game.

name: Guilty Gear: Strive - Additional Battle Stage: Fairy's Forest Factory
description: The additional battle stage "Fairy's Forest Factory" becomes selectable in-game.

name: Guilty Gear: Strive - Additional Battle Stage: Tír na nÓg
description: The additional battle stage "Tír na nÓg" becomes selectable in-game.

name: Cat Named Spirit
description: The game follows a cat asking about the developer's life.

name: Netannad
description: A fan-made dystopian sci-fi visual novel with Clannad characters.

name: Divinity Arrival
description:
Divinity Arrival is an idle role-play game based on global divinities.

Hundreds of glamorous divinities are waiting for you to collect and develop. Come to awake their inside divinity and found your own league. Ready to explore the sanctums around the world and search for the ancient relics with legendary divinities.

In this adventure, you’ll gradually gain the unrivaled power and create your own legends through challenging the throne of divinities.

Besides, the ingenious strategy is considerable important in each battle. As the leader of divinities, you’re expected to adjust your team according to each divinity’s divine power and links so that your team is invincible while conquering other divinities, even the hell and the heaven.

In addition, 24-hour idle rewards will be available through dispatching divinities to gain spoils of wars. You will definitely create your blissful garden of Eden in the end.

name: My Love for You is Evermore
description:
My Love for You is Evermore is a mobile otome game that lets you create your dream love story! Fall in love your way with one or more of these bachelors: Your work rival, your boss, the accounting executive, or your celebrity client!?

And now... your celeb client's mysterious manager who's always wearing a kitsuke mask joins the ranks! What could he be hiding?

As you enter your name, you enter your story! All conversation and images are oriented towards YOU, so you can fully immerse. And you'll immerse even further when you receive texts and hear your love interest's voice on video call segments throughout the story.

name: Snowkissed Romance
description: Fall in love in the cozy mountains of Northern Japan. Call, text, and make choices to snag the best ending!

name: Tokyo Revengers Pazuribe!
description: Tokyo Revengers: Pazuribe! is the official Tokyo Revengers game designed for smartphones on iOS and Android. It is a puzzle game with multiple sub-stories loosely based on the anime adaptation.

name: Untitled Tokyo Revengers Action RPG
description: A new 3D action RPG based on the popular manga and anime series Tokyo Revengers for PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, Switch, PC (DMM Games), iOS, and Android. A specific title was not announced. It will launch as a free-to-play title with item-based microtransactions this winter in Japan.

name: Ozmafia!! 0 Reflexion
description: Upcoming game in the Ozmafia series. A demo released in 2017.

name: Decay
description: A survival RPG that's about an hour long that's totally not influenced by current events. Go to work in the midst of a pandemic and a monster outbreak. Buy food and try not to starve. Hope you don't get sick or beaten to death on the way to work. Hope you don't lose it.

name: LIP! Lewd Idol Project Vol. 2: Hot Springs and Beach Episodes
description: The girls are back! Join Kairi, Ranko, and brand new member Yuki in these two new lewd adventures at the beach and hot springs. Hotter encounters, hotter conversations, hotter scenes and lots of girls’ love!

name: Bratavism
description: A solitary dolphin creature creates an abstract painting by throwing a tantrum!

name: Wishbind
description: A 2D platformer collect-a-thon in which you'll have to help someone collect a special kind of leaves to help them fulfill their project, while meeting interesting characters, overcoming tough platforming challenges and discovering secrets all throughout the world.

name: Ratchet: Deadlocked
description: A high-definition remaster version for the PlayStation 3, featuring 1080p upscaling.

name: Bullet Time
description: Bullet Time is a 3D shooter with RPG elements that tells the tale of a soldier of fortune in a colourful post-apocalyptic world.

name: Finding fairies
description: Finding Fairies' is a turn-based pathfinding puzzle game based on light and darkness mechanism.

name: Cuber
description: You have to beat the game with platforms

name: Moth Planet
description: Moth Planet is a kinetic, energetic 2D platformer where you interview moths and explore an interconnected world in search of the truth!

name: Chicken Balls
description: Chicken Balls is an Angry Birds-style arcade with realistic physics.

name: Tarot Uranai
description: FMV tarot reading game, including a set of cards. The card images are clearly influenced by Aleister Crowley’s Thoth Tarot, whose designs were created by Lady Frieda Harris in the early 1940s.

name: Gem King
description: Free-to-play iOS 5 port of Kickin Momma game added independently under a new title. The update also includes iCloud for game save files, full Twitter integration and Airplay Mirroring.

name: Getting Nuts
description: Climb up giant trees fighting angry birds and avoiding obstacles - but make sure you bring home some nuts for dinner!!

name: Neopets: Island Builders
description: Create and decorate a town for your Neopets! Build homes, amenities, parks, and more! With hundreds of craftable items and buildable blueprints, you have everything you need to create your perfect island town.

name: Pop's Pop's
description:
Pop's Pop's is an arcade game by South Korean studio Afega.

The goal of the game is to retrieve the title of a song. When the game is launched, the player can select a beginner or mania level. Next a spinning wheel is shown. The player has to press the "stop"-button and the wheel will slow down. When it stops, it is known how many points the player will get if he can guess a letter which is somewhere in the title.

name: Pet Luv Spa and Resort Tycoon
description:
To make money and reach the goal of each level you have to service the needs of the animals staying in your resort. Each animal will come to your resort with needs and an amount of money they are ready to spend. If the price of your rooms are equal or lower than what they are ready to afford the will rent a room in your resort. Animals will always try to rent the most expensive room available.

You service animals' needs by sending the animal to the proper stations where they will be serviced by your employees. If the animal is a V.I.P. (Very Important Pet) you'll have to service the pet's needs yourself. This is done through the minigames. Once all needs of an animal have been attended to the animal leaves your resort and pays you.

name: Danganronpa: Checkmate
description: Fangame made for the one month Fanganronpa challenge.

name: Mario Kart 64 Deluxe
description: A mod for Mario Kart 64 which swaps all the racers besides Mario for Link, Zero Suit Samus, Crash Bandicoot, Sonic the Hedgehog, Banjo, Waluigi, and Skull Kid.

name: Arcadia: Arcade Watch Games
description: Arcadia is a collection of 22 arcade games for Apple Watch, iPhone, iPad and Apple TV.

name: Flood-It!
description:
Flood the whole board with one color within the allowed steps. You start from the top left corner and progress by selecting one of the colored balls on the left.
When you change your current area color, every adjacent square with the same color also changes, that way you can flood other areas of the board. Select from 3 sizes of the board and try to flood-it in the least amount of steps! Addictive and Fun!

name: Flood-it! 2
description: Flood the whole board with one color. Wherever you go. Ridiculously addictive and fun! Flood-It! 2 - Like Flood-It!, Only better.

name: Nightclub Royale: Let's Party!
description: Run your nightclub and collect Epic and Legendary DJ and Dancer cards to lure in guests. Hire bodyguards, choose banger songs, mix cocktails, and resolve any sudden disturbances. Even if you start in small venues, tactical skills and economical savvy will take you to the top of the night owl scene and on your way to building your own Nightclub Empire.

name: Devil’s Propose
description: A dark romance fantasy otome.

name: Bride of the Twilight
description: A mobile otome game.

name: Bengarachou Hakubutsushi
description: Tomohisa has some memory of his childhood. When he was a kid, he was often playing at some place near his house. But his parents don't remember it. Tomohisa doesn't remember it clearly, either. One day, he finds a notebook. It is about history and things happened at a small town. It's just eccentric, so no one pays attention to it. But he knows who wrote it. It's his uncle, who has been missing for years. The notebook includes a town he spent his childhood. He soon gets interested in the town and decides to visit there. Days later, he arrives at the town, but there are a lot of strange things and customs in the town. He finds various curious goods there and gradually gets to know a secret of the town and his past....

name: Code: Dead Ends
description: A survival themed otome game.

name: Thunder Force IV
description:
A port of the masterpiece Genesis/Mega Drive shooter Thunder Force IV, released for the Sega Saturn in 1996 as part of the compilation Thunder Force Gold Pack II.

This port removes all slowdown, allows voice clips to play along with the music, and saves your high scores.

name: My Mystic Secretary
description: Otome game by Lumiere Entertainment.

name: Serendipity: The Mafias
description: A Story of the twisted fates in a brutal world.

name: Bride of the Full Moon
description: The fantasy that begins when the full moon RISES.

name: Haunted Obachestra Vol. 1 Awaking
description:
Haunted Obachestra is a fully-voiced visual novel by Poni-Pachet.

The first volume gives a closer look on Exnaz von Enterstein and Merry Christhrnova.

name: Haunted Obachestra Vol. 2 Bianke
description: Haunted Obachestra Vol. 2 Bianke follows Erlucia, Treis, Dhyos, & Henas.

name: Katarina's Farm
description: A mini farming simulator game of "My Next Life as a Villainess! All Routes Lead to Doom!". Let's make our own Katarina farm with cute pixel characters!

name: Adventure Reporter Ocean
description: Discovery Adventure Reporter Ocean is a side-scrolling platformer based in an ocean-like environment. The game disc used to be distributed inside Nesquik cereal boxes.

name: Adventure Reporter Jungle
description: Adventure Games 1 of 3 in each promo pack. Take up the challenge, take pictures, create a magazine. In an exciting computer game you will become a brave reporter. You will have to collect amazing facts and take pictures of rare animals and then make your own magazine!

name: Adventure Reporter Arctic
description: An old 2012 cereal game (promo game included on cereal boxes) lost in time. It's a game were you are a man whose job is to collect coins and take photos of wild animals during your journey on the wild lands of Antarctica.

name: Team Hot Wheels: Drift
description: Team Hot Wheels: Drift is an arcade racing game. The objective of the game is to score points in the race to unlock official Team Hot Wheels vehicles and car paint schemes. The points are earned for collecting pick-ups, smashing everything in the way, and winning the race. While racing a speed booster can be used. The player race against ghosts of the best times. The game features only one track, two camera views and allows to change the color of the driver and car parts. After scoring 100,000 points the player becomes a member of the Hot Wheels Team.

name: Team Hot Wheels: Baja
description: Team Hot Wheels: Baja is an arcade racing game. The objective of the game is to score points in the race to unlock official Team Hot Wheels vehicles and car paint schemes. The points are earned for collecting pick-ups, smashing everything in the way, and winning the race. While racing a speed booster can be used. The player race against ghosts of the best times. The game features only one track, two camera views and allows to change the color of the driver and car parts. After scoring 100,000 points the player becomes a member of the Hot Wheels Team.

name: Team Hot Wheels: Moto X
description: Team Hot Wheels: Moto X is an arcade racing game. The objective of the game is to score points in the race to unlock official Team Hot Wheels vehicles and car paint schemes. The points are earned for collecting pick-ups, smashing everything in the way, and winning the race. While racing a speed booster can be used. The player race against ghosts of the best times. The game features only one track, two camera views and allows to change the color of the driver and car parts. After scoring 100,000 points the player becomes a member of the Hot Wheels Team.

name: Houkago Cinderella 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Arcade Archives: Splatterhouse
description: An intense action-horror experience!

name: Cate P
description:
Cate P is a fast-paced one-button game.

You score points by destroying the caterpillars crawling around you. When you press a button you will rotate clockwise and shoot in the direction you were looking at before. Try to hit the caterpillars and avoid being hit by them. You score points by shooting the segments of a caterpillar.

The game is over when any caterpillar touches you.

name: Fastest on the Buzzer
description: Fastest on the Buzzer is a fast action multi-player trivia game you play against other players.

name: Tower Up
description: Build your highest tower up in the sky and higher.

name: Mirror 2: Console Edition
description: Enter the parallel worlds enriched by the stories and match-3 games developed using cel-shading techniques powered by Unreal Engine 4. Ponder on your choices because each of them will determine the fate of all.

name: Archers Dream
description: Welcome to the addictive world of archery! Immerse yourself in an epic video game adventure that will take you from one region to the next and challenge you through 30 exciting levels. Explore three breathtaking regions, each with its own unique atmosphere and challenges. Journey through majestic forests, steep mountain peaks, and a mysterious desert. Each region offers a rich visual experience and unique landscapes that will delight your senses.

name: MetaDude
description: Please connect, my user!

name: Coded Soul: Uketsunagareshi Idea
description: Sin descripción

name: Road Bustle 2
description: "Road Bustle 2" is a lively casual game that immerses you in a world filled with bustling traffic and endless adventures. The challenge lies in delivering packages across busy roads teeming with vehicles and even trains. As the player, you can choose transport to aid your journey, each lending a unique twist to the gameplay. The game is designed with vibrant, eye-catching graphics that add a dash of charm to the chaos of the roads. It's not just about survival; the speed of traffic increases over time, pushing your agility to the limit. Along the way, collect food to boost your speed and score points, adding a layer of fun and strategy.

name: Truck Simulator: Heavy Cargo Driver 2023
description: Welcome to Truck Simulator, the ultimate trucking experience where you embark on a thrilling journey to become the best delivery driver in the world.

name: Wathitdew Record: Game Studio - Battlefield
description: Wathitdew Record presents a new turn-based arcade fighting game featuring four universes from Wathitdew Game Studio franchises!

name: S.N.I.P.E.R.: Hunter Scope - Gold Edition
description:
Game includes:
15+ Stages
30+ Weapons

name: Suicide Guy: The Lost Dreams
description: A whole new loony dream world to explore!

name: Pizza Bar Tycoon: Co-op Edition
description: Become the pizza magnate! Create the best pizza in town!

name: Finding Heidi
description: Finding Heidi is a cute, wholesome endless runner side-scroller that uses reverse platformer mechanics to help little Nico the dinosaur find their missing companion Heidi.

name: Les Flics
description: In Les Flics, players steal the Purple Puma gem while pursued by Unspecteur Cleudeau and Gend'armerie Kaolin. Drive through a city with interconnected buildings, avoiding police cars. Inside, navigate platform stages with five levels, collect objects for the heist, and evade guards. Les Flics is inspired by the Pink Panther.

name: Hentai Girls: Deluxe Edition
description: Immerse yourself in the captivating world inhabited by Yui, Shirayuki, and Etsuko.

name: Bruxa
description: Candy world, book world, fantasy world...

name: Kindaichi Shounen no Jikenbo: Hoshimitou Kanashimi no Fukushuuki
description:
The idol at the height of the popularity got involved in a scandal scandal. Idol manager Tachibana Yufu was searching for the truth of it and was found dead. The police asserted Yufu's death as suicide, but there were two people who had suspicions in that.
One was former idol and Yufu's best friend Katsuragi Yo and another one Yufu's fiance Takuya Asagiri. The two of them decided to take revenge at a leisure facility "Hoshijima" where the stakeholders gathered, but there was a also present a grandson of Kaneda detective Kindaichi and his friends...

name: Legend of Taigong
description: A relaxed casual repair fairy game, suitable for leisure time to open a light pigeon game. You can play as a disciple brought up by Jiang Ziya and experience the life of a practitioner without the aura of the main character in an overhead world.

name: Narcotics Police: Crime And Punish
description: It is a first -person (FPS) exploration game. You need to explore the map and collect various documents and items. Fight with dark power. The game contains a lot of information, you need to find the truth in this information and get the ending

name: Sinister Games
description: “Sinister Games is a social deduction game with 8 players, 2 infiltrators, and a "Core" in an asylum. Use rewards to buy items from the vending machine for protection. Find the infiltrators, vote out the King to win. Infiltrators assassinate players, if all players are assassinated, they win.”

name: You're My Penguin
description: Help Jun, a self described "chronic over-thinker" make decisions at his new school with friends, conflicts, and romance in this Shounen-ai, anime style, coming of age story! This game offers a visual gallery with over 35 art to unlock, beautiful scenery, music, visual effects, and sound effects!

name: X-Plane 12: Aerosoft - Airport Milano Malpensa
description: The Brughiera plains to the north-west of Milano rank as the cradle of Italian aircraft construction. Today, Milano-Malpensa is one of merely a few airports left in this historic region. Malpensa is the second largest airport in Italy and serves as a hub for Alitalia, the largest Italian airline.

name: World of Art: Learn with Jigsaw Puzzles - Pixel Art by Numbers
description: All Your favorite Paintings from "World of Art - learn with Jigsaw Puzzle" Collection! Choose Your favorite Pixel Art resolution, a number of colors in Your color palette and start painting!

name: Warp Gate World Kingdom Tales
description: This is a high degree of freedom single player battle chess game. You can pass the level by entering any teleportation gate within the level. You can save at the beginning of each round. The stronghold interface allows for job transfer.

name: Skippy's Diner
description: Skippy's Diner is a short, but fun horror game that features great pixel art and 2d style 90s arcade aesthetic. The movement is basic but gives a sense of fatigue and struggle when trying to escape from Skippy. Featuring great sounds along with a good 90s arcade feel on the music as well.

name: Village & Monsters
description: Village & Monsters is a card game that challenges you to develop a human settlement as well as viruses. The settlement is periodically attacked by monsters, but the monster population is held back by a virus. The goal of the game is to reach a population of 100 people and not let the virus die.

name: Tiny Visitors
description: Tiny Visitors is a 3D Platformer, based on physics, mixing escape-game, search & find and mini-games. You can play up to 4 players in local coop.

name: Trigger Fever
description: Engage in chaotic multiplayer battles in Trigger Fever, a top-down shooter party game. Crush foes solo or with friends, wielding 50+ unique weapons. Show off skills, tactically dominate, and embrace the crazy onslaught!

name: Treasure Mountain
description: Collect a treasure, slay the dragon

name: The Assailant's Arrival
description: Alternative Universe Game/Sci-Fi Game

name: Spirit Island: Horizons of Spirit Island
description: Horizons of Spirit Island adds 5 new Spirits and 3 new island boards for even more variety.

name: Street Thugz
description: Traditional arcade action fighting game, restoring the punchy impact of STREETS OF RAGE. Like SHADOW FORCE, you can control any enemy and BOSS in the game and compete for the title of Final Fight King.

name: Bladesong
description: Crafting/management game Bladesong is set on taking swordmaking mechanics to a new level, featuring unparalleled customization of the sword's every detail and deep analysis of the sword's physical properties. Take the role of a swordsmith in the city of Eren Keep, one of mankind’s last standing cities after the gods have banished themselves in an act of desperation. Run your forge, fulfill customer commissions and perfect your craft and tools. Find your way in a city governed by an idolized ruler with an iron grip and build a loyal team of those you deem trustworthy.

name: Fortnite: Voidlander Pack
description: Leave only destruction as you pass through the void. In Absenz you will find the path of the Voidlander.

name: Fortnite: Diamond Diva Pack
description: Shine like a diamond with the Diamond Diva pack.

name: Army of Frogs HD
description: Sin descripción

name: Needle Of Anger
description:
Caution! This game, please Want Please note that there is a frustration-induced and cancer induction.
This game is the perfect thread through that game to a simple person.
Success when you pass through the thin thread into the hole in the small needle!
However, please note the Tremor symptoms.
Side effects of this game, please note that there is a case in which frustrating is throw to explode.

name: Pug Hop Mole Bop
description:
You must protect this yard!
It’s up to you **Gizmo Puddinkiss** to save the day. Bop and hop and make the moles go away!
Tap on your device to make Gizmo jump to the left or to the right. Hold left or right to make him sprint that direction. Land on top of the moles when they show their furry faces!

name: Nerd Blocks
description:
In an exciting game we combine words with passion for anime, movies, games, TV series and everything that is described as NERD!
Test yourself in remembering movie details or all the characters in your favorite series.

name: Cardfight!! Vanguard: Dear Days - Additional Card Set Vol. 4 D-SS03: Stride Deckset - Chronojet
description: Additional Card Set for Cardfight!! Vanguard: Dear Days!

name: Cardfight!! Vanguard: Dear Days - Character Set 07: Chrono Shindou
description: Additional Card Set for Cardfight!! Vanguard: Dear Days!

name: Mixx Island: Remix Plus - Ultimate Edition
description: Mixx Island Remix Plus is a high-energy, action-packed shooter set in a fantastic 2D world. Gather your wits, sharpen your reflexes, and prepare for the ultimate challenge.

name: Family Chess: Ultra Deluxe
description: Prepare for loads of fun with this cartoon version of the most popular board game in the world.

name: All Elite Wrestling: Fight Forever - FTR: Revival Pack
description: Expand your AEW player roster with FTR, former AEW World Tag Team Champions, Dax Harwood and Cash Wheeler AND gain access to two brand new minigames: JoinUs and Deth Race-X

name: Gloomhaven: Mercenaries Edition
description: Gloomhaven Mercenaries Edition includes Gloomhaven base game and the Solo Scenarios: Mercenary Challenges DLC.

name: Gloomhaven: Gold Edition
description: Gloomhaven Gold Edition includes Gloomhaven base game, the Jaws of the Lion DLC and the Solo Scenarios: Mercenary Challenges DLC.

name: Johnny Trigger Action Collection
description: My Name is Trigger... Johnny Trigger

name: Metal Gear & Metal Gear 2: Solid Snake
description: The first and second title in the Metal Gear series that established the stealth action genre, as well as the basic mechanics of the series.

name: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: All-Star Battle R - Season Pass 2
description:
The JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: All-Star Battle R Season Pass includes 3 playable characters. Experience the full JoJo universe with the All-Star Battle R Season Pass 2! Unlock new characters with new and bizarre abilities!

Season Pass 2 includes:
• DLC Character 5
• DLC Character 6
• DLC Character 7

Season Pass 2 Bonuses:
• DLC Character early access
• Giorno Giovanna Haruno Shiobana Costume
Start your journey on the path to being a Gang-star as Haruno Shiobana before he became known as Giorno Giovanna!

name: Dead by Daylight: Attack on Titan - Warhammer Pack
description: It's your last chance to get these 5 Attack on Titan Outfits for The Spirit, Felix, Kate, Zarina, and Ace before they leave the store on July 18th. The War Hammer Pack only includes the Outfits, and Dead by Daylight characters must be purchased separately.

name: Dead by Daylight: Attack on Titan - Armored Pack
description: It's your last chance to get these 5 Attack on Titan Outfits for The Oni, Dwight, Yui, Jake, and Meg before they leave the store on July 18th. The Armored Pack only includes the Outfits, and Dead by Daylight characters must be purchased separately.

name: Moto Rush GT: Silver Edition
description: Ultimate motorbike racing experience for all ages!

name: Knights & Guns: Silver Edition
description:
Knights & Guns: Silver Edition is a digital bundle that contains the base game and Armor Pack #2 which adds 2 majestic armors, epitomizing grandeur and strength.

A classic revenge story set in a medieval fantasy world… with a touch of deadly modern firepower just to turn things up to eleven. Fight through the armies of undead, mutants, aliens, machines and beasts in order to get back what is rightfully yours and bring some semblance of peace back to the land. Who knows - if you’re thorough enough you might even discover the history of the kingdom itself, long lost to the scholars of the realm.

name: Cop Police Escape: Racing Zone Clash
description: Welcome to Cop Police Escape Racing Zone Clash, an exhilarating arcade-style game where you can experience the thrill of driving different cars in challenging situations.

name: Compression HD
description:
Eliminate the blocks before the walls close in on you!
Mixing the classic gameplay style of traditional block dropping games, with a uniquely dynamic gaming surface, Compression creates an ever changing challenge for even the most advanced block dropping fan.

name: Hypastorm
description: A fast, physics based, twin stick indie game. In a distant future, take your craft and enter the arena to shoot and bounce your way to victory and glory.

name: Galaxy Dwellers
description:
Here it is! Absolutely incredible sci-fi strategy game from authors of Tower Dwellers!
Choose from 3 powerful armies, lead your unique units, fight in epic battles and CONQUER THE SPACE!

name: The Ball Game: One Touch Arcade
description: Improve your concentration and patience with every game played. Excel your skills and better your score.

name: Barcode Kingdom
description:
Scan barcodes, Get unique units and items!
Build your own kingdom.
The world named 'Barcodia' is comprised of the magical power of barcodes.
Barcodes in the real world is a magic circle that transmit the magical power from the real world to 'Barcodia'.
The barcodes around you will become your army.
Summon various units and items, and make the strongest army.
Share good barcodes and fight against the monsters with your friends.

name: Chimera Island
description: Rediscover a lost island with mysterious creatures the world has long since forgotten. Now it is up to you to help restore this ruined world and bring about a new age of Chimera.

name: The Unic
description:
Expand your patterns collection to generate colorful shapes compositions.
Capture duplicates, unveil The Unic, see how much you can reveal!
The Unic is an observation game which should thrill any pattern and design lover.
Whether you know what polka dots, tartan, argyle or gingham are, get ready to enjoy yourself in this fresh, highly colored and delicately crafted game!

name: Flip It 2
description:
Are you ready to take the ultimate Flip Challenge! Flip It is one of the most challenging game you'll play all summer. Your goal is to go around different shapes and collect coins to complete each level. You will encounter many obstacles on your way to glory so keep your eyes open.
Use the coins you collect to unlock epic skins. Compete with your friends on the online leaderboards. There are two game modes arcade and endless mode. In the endless mode we will be giving you a new shape to master everyday. Compete with players around the globe to be on top and reign supreme.

name: Bricks of Rome
description:
Rome was not built in a single day, that's for sure. It took many years and much effort to become the empire that we all know. Grab your sword and shield and put a small stone to build this empire.
The game "Bricks of Rome" is a mixture of arcade and strategy games. Move the plate in the bottom of the screen with your finger and chip the ball that is coming towards you and return it to the enemy ranks that consists of a series of blocks and other objects. The game's story takes place between 300 BC to 100 BC in the Mediterranean area and you can choose from a variety of states and nations of the era such as the Romans, the Kingdom of Macedonia, the Greek city-states, the Gallic tribes, the Carthaginians, the Epirus, the Seleucids, the Ptolemies, the Germanic tribes, the British tribes or the Kingdom of Pergamon. Through separate campaigns you will lead your people to victory and you will become the Supreme Ruler in the Mediterranean Sea. To achieve this, you will need to hire mercenaries or to upgrade your weapons and armor of your soldiers or build forts and palisades.

name: Warbirds P-51 Mustang ACE
description: Warbirds P-51 Mustang is a 3d WWII air combat game, a flight sim with accelerometer control, photo-realistic scene, and battle missions based on true history.

name: Word Search Explorer
description:
A new twist on the classic word search. Use your skills of deduction to uncover the letters that make up each word. Every word found gives you additional moves to work with. How many moves will it take you to solve each puzzle?
Collect animal friends along the way to assist you as you navigate this world of words. Each has a different power that will help you solve the puzzle and increase your score. Challenge your friends and the world with your best high scores on the leader-boards.

name: Fusion Bundle
description: Embark on three spine-chilling adventures with this game bundle. Face the terrifying Cthulhu Mythos in The Sinking City, and join a young Sherlock Holmes on a mind-bending journey to fame in Chapter One and The Awakened.

name: Time of War, Arkano'90
description: Frantic and varied combat with a Simul-Arcade gameplay piloting state-of-the-art helicopters. Face the most advanced enemies in weapons. Take control of an Arkano and feel almighty knocking down and destroying everything in your path. Are you ready for the challenge? Humanity depends on you!

name: Detective Reborn Bundle
description: Become a young Sherlock Holmes and solve two mind-bending mysteries that will scar the brilliant detective forever.

name: Space Funeral 2
description: Space Funeral 2, also known as Blood Blood, is a very brief fan-made sequel to Space Funeral and was released by DarkChibiShadow on October 13, 2012. It is regarded as the shortest game in the series. Space Funeral 2 is then followed by Earth Birth.

name: Kloot Arena
description: Welcome to Kloot Arena! This turn-based Online PvP Battle Arena game delivers non-stop action with fast-paced, skill and strategy-driven battles.

name: Rage of Blades
description:
Rage of Blades is a brutal and unforgiving online PvP action/fighting game that brings players to the heart of medieval combat. From the blood-soaked battlefields of Northern Arenas to the sun-baked Arenas of South, warriors from across the globe have come together to test their mettle in one-on-one duels that will leave only the strongest standing.
Choose your fighter from a cast of legendary warriors including Vikings, Knights, Assassins and more. Each warrior brings their own unique style and skills to the fray, challenging you to master new strategies and techniques as you fight your way to the top.

name: Lucid Lenses
description:
Lucid Lenses is a captivating story-driven romance adventure game that takes you on a journey of love, ambition, and tough decisions.
Follow the story of a couple who meet and fall in love, but as they pursue their individual career dreams, they find themselves facing a difficult choice: continue their relationship or break up for the sake of their careers.

name: Daisho: Survival of a Samurai
description: Daisho: Survival of a Samurai is an Action RPG set in the Sengoku era of Japanese history. War is raging as Oda Nobunaga is determined to depose the weak shogun on his throne, engulfing the kingdom in flames and it is your fate to craft your legacy.
Build a chain of as many tiles as the number shown on the tile to explode the chain and get the score. Make a longer chain and get a higher score! Rotate the tiles for extra possibilities!

name: JigZone
description: JigZone - Jigsaw Puzzles provide hours of entertainment for you, your whole family and your friends. Give us a try and you'll never need to look for those missing pieces on the floor!

name: Empire's Order
description:
Empire's Order is a unique sci-fi game that takes players on a journey on a distant planet in the galaxy where a precious ore is waiting to be mined. As the chosen one, it is up to you to settle on the planet, extract the ore, and deliver it to the Empire in a timely manner.
Players will have the ability to build their own deck, research new technologies, upgrade their equipment, trade with other players, and run operations with their agents. With a variety of gameplay options and the use of all means necessary to deliver the ore, Empire's Order offers an engaging and challenging rogue-lite incremental deck-building experience.
The game features 42 different cards, 37 different buildings, 33 events, and 84 achievements, as well as a variety of events, perks, and specializations to keep players engaged and challenged.

name: Air Hockey Championship
description: Discover this top free air hockey game with championship mode and amazing features!

name: God's Orbits
description:
God has been making planets and stars orbit around each other for billions of years. But as any normal person, He now needs a break. So, as God takes a week’s vacation and goes to Cancún, you need to replace Him and do His job.
The game is a gravity simulation based on Newton’s law of universal gravity where you control the speed and direction of a single planet. You’ll need to find the precise trajectory of this planet to make it orbit around another celestial body.
A lot of features are offered to diversify the different challenges at hand.

name: Maria Way
description:
Do you crave the limelight? Now with this new clicker simulator game you get a chance to become popular.
Maria Way, one of the most hyped vloggers, will take you through the whole process – from picking a topic for your video to growing your subscribers’ community!

name: Temtem: Showdown
description: Jump right into Temtem competitive action in this free multiplayer battle simulator! Build your team in seconds and dash into ranked matches with players from all over the world for pure, no-frills Temtem battling action—no leveling or taming required!

name: 5 A Side Legends
description: Start from the bottom of and lead your 5 a side team to eternal glory! 5 a side legends allows you to manage your very own 5 a side team with all the drama, excitement and banter of real life.

name: GForce 2
description:
GFORCE 2 is a very fun game where your mission is to collect a certain amounts of diamonds or rescue people
in a hostile world with many obstacles.You can play it like a regular cave flyer with gravity or like a shooter with a joystick.
Tilt left or right your device to help water to find it's way, or use missile for make your way in the environment.
By default the game's difficulty is set to hard if it's too hard,change it to easy you will have a shield around your ship.

name: Airport Trucks Car Parking Simulator
description: Ever wanted to be an Airport Driver? Now is your chance! Take the controls of 3 vital Airport Support Vehicles and pass your Driving Test at the Airport today!

name: Supercar Driving Simulator
description: An open-world, exotic car driving simulator that features unique and realistic physics with car damage, retina graphics and traction control to help you control even the most powerful hypercars. You can choose from 4 radio stations to set the mood for driving.

name: Hide n' Explode
description: The explosive multiplayer game where seekers blow up hiders while they desperately try to blend in with decoys. Expect chaos, laughter, and thrilling gameplay! Don't forget to use the built in proximity voice chat!

name: Conscience
description: Play as an objective strand of an all knowing hivemind, and guide these lost aliens to by showing them the proper path of morality!

name: Forest of Lesbians
description: A fantasy comedy hybrid visual novel. Simple fast paced action/puzzle gameplay between story elements. Anime/pixelart/jrpg style.

name: Mencia: A Never Was Tale
description: Mencia: A Never Was Tale., is a styled rogue-like, 2D platform, in which you will have to face agains an invasion of cute aliens using the properties a magic sword will give you. Let's go!

name: Yohane the Parhelion: Blaze in the DeepBlue
description: Yohane the Parhelion: Blaze in the DeepBlue is an official spin-off of Love Live! Sunshine. Yohane's fantasy world sets the stage for a 2D metroidvania in "Yohane the Parhelion: Blaze in the Deepblue"!

name: Putin Must Die: Defend the White House
description: Vladimir has gone mad. He has created an army of Russian-speaking Putin clones to destroy America, and the White House is the final frontier. You must defend the White House against invading hordes of Vladimir clones, or become one of them.

name: Xaladia: Rise of the Space Pirates X2
description: Upgrade your weapons, control armaments, and annihilate space pirates! Cover the screen with a barrage of support weapons such as missiles, lasers, barriers, and bots! Captivate players with non-scrolling single-screen combat, flashy support attacks with armaments, and beautiful 3D graphics.

name: Stuck With Naughty Housewives
description: Three married women are lonely due to various reasons. So they set their sights on a introverted young man living in the same apartment...?

name: Mind
description: Mind is a minimalistic puzzle game. Using 4 directions and an interactive environment, you need to navigate and reach the final square. Challenge your mind through 60 levels.

name: Per Aspera VR
description: Per Aspera VR is a unique narrative simulation & strategy game specially designed for VR. Take control of AMI, the galaxy’s most sophisticated AI, tasked with an important mission: Terraform Mars and make it a habitable planet. You decide the future — terraform, make crucial narrative decisions, manage resources, discover long-hidden secrets, and immerse yourself in a rich and compelling story.

name: Gun Jam VR
description: GUN JAM is a rhythm FPS where the player must shoot to the beat to survive. It features a unique beat-pattern shooting mechanic and firefights synced to the original soundtrack in a vibrant world. Prepare to obliterate enemies whilst blasting to the beat.

name: Oral Lessons With Chii-chan
description: Kouta, a timid university student is tasked with tutoring the outgoing yet dense Chieri to help her get through her exams. However, they couldn't be more different. Find out what hijinks ensue in Oral Lessons With Chii-chan!

name: To Be A King: Volume 1
description: Sin descripción

name: Jumpah
description: Take the title for the fastest Jumpah alive, and in the process make your friends hate their lives! Parkour, Rage, anger, frustration, disappointment, despair, depression, and lots of colors! What more could you ask for?

name: Mystery Solitaire: The Black Raven 5
description: These are dark and mysterious times. 200 not easy levels in the game "Mystery Solitaire. The Black Raven 5" is waiting for your mind.

name: Amogus TD 2: Defense of the Sus
description: Sussy tower defense game with unlimited ways to play the game. Play with unique towers and upgrade them to create perfect defense. Master every map and become the greatest sussy commander.

name: Catass
description: In Catass, you'll be a cat and show your great superiority to your human through fun and short adventures, puzzles, achievements, and lots of humor.

name: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare II - Griffin: Pro Pack
description: Get Call of Duty Points and in-game content for Call of Duty: Modern Warfare II and Warzone.

name: Edge of Grief
description: Edge of Grief is a 2D action platforming game about restoring a dark world to its former glory. It combines discovering deep emotions and an action platform experience as you become the ‘hero' unveiling the truth inside as you take another step closer to atonement

name: Curse of the Shadow Samurai
description: Seek vengeance, battling hordes of enemies across multiple stages. Conquer challenging waves, obtain powerful upgrades, and face formidable bosses. Unleash retribution in this thrilling quest for justice!

name: Fista 3-in-1 Retro Pack
description: 3 Free 8-bit games you can play on your PC! Carpet Shark, Plummet Challenge Game, & The Arm Wrestling Classic.

name: Happy Wagon
description: A happy little game about the struggles of old-timey travelling.Happy Wagon features several difficulties, unlockable characters, an endless mode and achievements. Happy Travels!

name: Royalevia
description: The game takes place in a dark and spooky forest where the player takes on the role of a dark knight, who must move through the treacherous terrain and fight the hordes of the undead that have risen from the dead.

name: Every Year Banjir
description: Survive a flood scenario in this animal-fantasy world depicted in an era where floods happen every year! Survive the harsh conditions of the random rainfalls and equip yourself with flood survival knowledge. Learn real world survival skills and make decisions that will save lives.

name: Radiant Reckoning: Subterranean Odyssey
description: The only way to play is to survive every raids. The more you explore the open world more you get better loots.

name: Animal Planner
description: Animal Planner is a satisfying sliding puzzle game, a game to make all animals happy!

name: Green Zone
description: Earn points with central zones but watch out for wind. Try to get a high score before the minute timer runs out.

name: Fernbus Simulator: Denmark
description: The danish are considered to be the happiest people in the world. They have their own word for cosiness and that is hyggelig. Perhaps it is the gentle and beautiful landscape that makes the danish people happy. Owners of the Fernbus coach simulator can now find out with the add-on Denmark.

name: Nine Realms: Revolt
description: A story driven deckbuilding adventure. Unlock 150+ cards from 5 factions as you try to save the realm. Combine up to 3 factions to create your own decks. Play units and spells to defend your 3 banners, and use dice to choose between reinforcing a lanes defenses, or empowering your units.

name: Cones in Space
description: Cones in Space: Literally the best survival game you will ever play.

name: Approaching Cao Army
description: This is a positional combat game that combines elements of Snake, Grid Avoidance, and Vampire-style combat. Players control the entire team of heroes by controlling the leader. The cute art style, beautiful music, and smooth rhythm combine to offer a pleasant experience.

name: DCS World: F-15E
description: The F-15E, developed in the mid 1980's, is a dual-role fighter designed to perform air-to-air and air-to-ground missions. An array of avionics and electronics systems give the F-15E the capability to fight at low or high altitude, day or night, and in all weather.

name: DraftyCar
description: DraftyCar is a fast-paced racing game simulating the art of professional stockcar drafting. Tweak the physics to your liking and immerse yourself in pursuit of victory. Strategically place your car to gain speed, disrupt your competition and navigate a high-speed drag race to the finish.

name: Dunia: The North Wood
description: In this action-adventure RPG, explore a strange and futuristic island-city as Secret Police Captain Aeydrien Mason-Northwood. Become a Villain, Hero, or something in between as you deal with the island's various problems in any way you see fit.

name: Main Action
description: Main Action - 3d top-down shooter with pixel graphics, not a long game with magic and monsters. In this game you will save the world and the villagers from evil. You are a magical creature who alone must cope with evil.

name: Panpu-ja
description: You control three employees of a cleaning company, carrying out their jobs, but be careful, as engaging in activities outside of work may lead to undesirable outcomes.

name: Alien Cube
description: Alien Cube is a futuristic puzzle adventure game full of traps! Help Logan find his way out of the HYPERCUBE!

name: Railed Up
description: A shooter inside tramways on suspended railways viewed from below, set in a dystopian future.

name: Shadowvane
description: Shadowvane is a Soulslike MMO with a 1v1 PvP Arena, 5v5 Battlegrounds, and an Open World realm where players can interact and advance their character.

name: Lim Beyond One-on-One Basketball
description: LiM Beyond One-on-One Basketball - In a nutshell, the game involves two pads and bouncing the ball to hit the opponent's basket. You can win or lose, and there's even an arcade mode that's crazy-crazy. The game's simplistic setup makes it suitable for players of all skill levels and ages.

name: Little Harvest
description: Plant, water, and harvest your crops. Expand your land and buy new crops and items!

name: Basalt Breaker
description: Basalt Breaker is a fresh, 3rd person, isometric take on a beloved puzzle game. Explore classic rooms, perfect your skills on replay-able daily puzzles, or try uniquely shaped custom floors. The perfect comfort game to play while queuing for a match or sitting through a tedious meeting.

name: Vacation Paradise: Florida - Collector's Edition
description: Take a Vacation in Florida! Beautiful beaches, large lakes and exciting activities await.

name: JR EAST Train Simulator: Keiyo Line (Soga to Tokyo) E233-5000 Series
description: The Keiyo Line, which opened in 1990, is a relatively young line within JR East, connecting Chiyoda-ku, Tokyo, with Chiba City, Chiba Prefecture. Except for the underground section between Tokyo Station and Etchujima Station, the entire line is characterized by running on elevated tracks along Tokyo Bay.

name: Café Enchanté: Limited Edition
description: When Kotone inherits her grandfather's Tokyo café, she discovers the shop holds more secrets than anyone could imagine. The café is a meeting spot for beings from multiple, mystical worlds. You’ll meet the king of demons, a humanoid beast, a fallen angel, and more. And when government agents monitoring non-human activities show up at your door, your new café is about to become a lot more colorful.

name: Roda a Roda
description:
Roda a Roda is a fan-made web browser game developed by Games X based on the Brazilian version of Wheel of Fortune featuring Silvio Santos, where you guess letters until you can guess the phrase.

In 2015, the game was taken down after a request from trademark owners of the game show.

name: EchtegP
description:
EchtegP is platformer in Godot. Enjoy and keep track of future updates.
You can play with WASD or arrow keys and additionally space bar is for jumping.

name: Bad Boro
description: Ever imagine a Souls-like set in an early 2000’s cartoon world? Well, look no further: Explore the cartoony & dystopian city of Badlerboro with its unique districts, wacky citizens, and unforgiving enemies.

name: Soul Detective
description: Worthy Souls are being held back from moving on the land of the dead, the Soul Detective Agency is on the case! Our Detective and his trusty partner Magnus, enraptured in the magnifying glass creating a ghoulish weapon of destruction, are here to defeat the demons who are causing this catastrophe.

name: Angel Legion: Seductive Maid - Red
description: Embark on your adventure with player from all over the world! Lead your Angel team to reveal the ancient mysteries of Galaxy…… Welcome to Angel legion, a free RPG gacha game with good fun!

name: Neve
description: Neve is a non-linear interactive fiction in which your decisions can completely change the course of history. Manage your team, race against time and unravel the mysteries surrounding your ship's crash in this suffocating retrofuturistic thriller that will have you hooked from the first second.

name: Incremental Factory
description: Craft and automate an industrial empire from scratch! Experience a strategic game teeming with challenges as you manage resources, overcome hurdles, and optimize production chains. Are you ready to conquer the challenges of Incremental Factory? Your journey starts here... The Factory Must Grow!

name: Square & Line
description:
Dare your dexterity and skill with this free game. Clear different obstacles and achieve the highest score. How far can you go?
Touch drag on screen to move square avoid paths.

name: Super Hero Warehouse
description: The villains are dropping dangerous and hazardous containers on earth. A Super Hero is here to protect us. You are The Super Hero and you are in command. You need to arrange and align these dangerous Metal Boxes in lines so they can be shipped off and destroyed. You can push the steel boxes right or left to align them evenly. You can jump over one box (or 2 if you get the power-up) if you need to. Once you have created a full line on boxes, they will disappear.

name: Sum Idea
description: Slide numbers to match patterns - not as easy as it looks! 140 puzzles to win, can you beat Professor Addkins? A great brain game suitable for young and old.

name: Top Farm
description:
Build the land you’ve always wanted. Make it your own. Invite your dearest friends and help it grow!
Your story awaits in Top Farm, a place away from the noise and stress of modern life. Here you can explore the peace and prosperity of a land in tune with nature, experience the thrill of an honest day’s work, and meet new friends who share in every celebration.
With just a touch of magic around every corner, Top Farm offers surprises, adventure and the satisfaction only found in a place of your very own.

name: Crazy Trip
description: Start your journey in the world of the coolest cars, dashing race and logical tasks. All the tasks are introduced in interactive form for better perception of children.

name: Glass2
description: Aaron, the Eromancer of the Glass Hunter, who transforms the energy "libido" into cards, uses his cards to create a blast to save the Glassmaidens who are trapped in a glass world!

name: Capsman 3D
description:
Capsman 3D! The new battle of the coffee bean can start now!

Capsman now has to save the coffee beans from its enemies but once again the biodegradable capsules will give him more energy for reaching the goal. Who plays with Capsman 3D must overcome many obstacles and enemies even more insidious.

name: Amairo Chocolate 2
description: Yunagicho, a town lined with Western-style homes. The previous autumn was when Yuzuki came to this town and met the animal eared girls and started working with them at Cafe Setaria.

1+ minute box game

name: iBlast Moki HD
description:
iBlast Moki has been completely redesigned for the iPad with high-definition graphics

Do you love bombs, creating contraptions and solving physics puzzles?
iBlast Moki is an original physics puzzle game where you blast cute little Mokis with the help of bombs and other crazy items.

name: Minecraft: Xbox Edition - Skin Pack 1
description: Minecraft: Xbox Edition - Skin Pack 1 comes with 45 skins, most of them based on characters from various games.

name: iBlast Moki 2
description:
In this new adventure, the Mokis will use the help of new gameplay elements such as the paint bombs and more crazy contraptions to reach the magic spiral.

This critically-acclaimed puzzle game features 90 levels set across 6 unique worlds. In each one, your goal is the same: to create a path to the goal for all of the Mokis using only the bombs you're given. Given their round shape Mokis can roll quite well, but for everything else you'll need to choose the right tool to help them. Place the bombs wherever you like and set their timers to try to create just the right chain reaction to solve the puzzle. Head into the Create mode and build your own elaborate designs for others to challenge. It's a blast!

name: Minecraft: The Simpsons Skin Pack
description: Minecraft: The Simpsons Skin Pack is a skin pack for Minecraft which contains 24 Simpsons-themed skins, released on February 27, 2015 and was delisted on May 30, 2017.

name: Minecraft: Marvel's Guardians of the Galaxy Skin Pack
description: Minecraft: Marvel's Guardians of the Galaxy Skin Pack was a skin pack for Minecraft that contained 24 skins and was released on September 5, 2014, for the Xbox 360 and Xbox One and was available until December 21, 2015.

name: Toiletrooms
description:
You wake up in the dark, checking your pocket you find a lighter. You are in a very strange place. You see many corridors that are filled with toilet cubicles, urinals and sinks. You begin to explore the area in the hope of finding a way out.

Toiletrooms are an endless gloomy maze of toilets. It is inhabited by strange creatures. It probably looks like a backrooms, but instead of being empty, it has toilet cubicles, sinks, urinals, and lots of pipes.

The game was made in two weeks. Inspired by the universe backrooms and samosbor.

name: Minecraft: Doctor Who Skin Pack - Volume I
description: Minecraft: Doctor Who Skin Pack - Volume I is a skin pack for Minecraft that contains 57 Doctor Who-themed skins.

- Underworld Desdemona Outfit
- Frozen Oculara Back Bling
- Cold Furia Pickaxe
- Frozen Over Wrap

name: Just a Boat Trip
description:
This game was made in 3 hours for One Minute Jam.

A PS1-style game in which you just sail the boat.

description: Collaboration between Dozle & Spy Rumble! Let's play on the map with "Rocky-kun", a character invented by Ooharamen of Dozle Corp.!

description: Customise your monsters with this pack of eight medieval-themed premium cosmetic items. Show off your monster bling!

name: Monster Racing League: Mythology Cosmetics Pack
description: Customise your monsters with this pack of eight mythology-themed premium cosmetic items. Show off your monster bling!

name: Monster Racing League: Shogun Cosmetics Pack
description: Customise your monsters with this pack of nine feudal Japan themed premium cosmetic items. Show off your monster bling!

name: Monster Racing League: Ignition Premium Pass
description: Ignition Season Pass!Get the Premium Pass and unleash an additional 80 unlockable items in Monster Racing League's Race Pass. Stand out with premium cosmetics and unlock powerful monsters faster!

name: Mega Man Battle Network Legacy Collection Vol. 1: Custom Pet Pack Vol. 1
description: Two rearranged music tracks for the in-game music player and a "Special Skin" that changes the appearance of the 3D MegaMan on the menu screen.

name: Mega Man Battle Network Legacy Collection Vol. 2: Custom Pet Pack Vol. 2
description: Two rearranged music tracks for the in-game music player and a "Special Skin" that changes the appearance of the 3D MegaMan on the menu screen.

name: Arma 3 Creator DLC: Global Mobilization - Cold War Germany
description: Willkommen! It's time for you to return to the Cold War. With its bombastic amounts of new original content, the Global Mobilization - Cold War Germany Creator DLC for Arma 3 invites you to live and breathe the military conflict between the two Germanies in the 1980s. Ride into armored combat against a determined enemy that easily outnumbers you. Experience warfare from the perspective of infantry reinforced with APCs. Or breach the historic inner German border to force the enemy’s hand in battle. Which side of the wall will you fight for? Besides the West and East German armies, this DLC pack also includes Denmark as a smaller but viable military faction, whereas the Polish People's Army reinforces their East German comrades.

name: Arma 3 Creator DLC: Western Sahara
description:
New and improved variants of existing vehicles in ArmA 3 itself are bundled with the DLC: namely, the Marshall IFV and Marid APC, both of which have been granted modular capabilities to expand their roles. Alongside this are enhancements to the Zamak truck which has gained (optional) anti-aircraft guns and ViVT-capable models. The Offroad pickup and the PO-30 Orca helicopter have also been outfitted with up-armour packages designed to increase their survivability.

Additionally, five new factions - some based on existing factions from the Armaverse, along with a slew of handheld firearms, a static gun turret, and new drones in the form of armed UAVs that can either be outfitted with improvised explosives or handheld small arms, are included in the DLC. Lastly, this is all accompanied by a wide selection of (both new and retextured) personal gear and vehicular assets that are camouflaged to suit the arid environment of Sefrou-Ramal.

name: Forza Motorsport: Premium Edition
description: Forza Motorsport Premium Edition includes the full game with up to 5 days early access, Race Day Car Pack, Car Pass (30 cars delivered to your game weekly, one per week), VIP Membership and Welcome Pack.

name: Tintin Reporter: Cigars of the Pharaoh - Collector's Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Baby Shark: Sing & Swim Party
description: Swim across the wide ocean with the Shark Family to enjoy the Fin-tastic Festival. Choose from five customizable characters and play either in the runner or rhythmic game mode. Sing and swim to fin-omenal songs and get rewarded with tons of musical cards to add to your album.

name: Runnordai
description:
Enter the foreboding world of Runnordai, an eerie and unsettling game set within the confines of a sprawling hospital. As you navigate the labyrinthine corridors, your sole objective is to check every locker and uncover a crucial code needed to escape. But beware, a sinister figure lurks in the shadows, emerging at random intervals with distorted laughter and a chilling presence that clouds your vision.

Time is of the essence in this macabre chase. Lingering too long in a certain area spells doom, but swift evasion can keep you one step ahead. Equipped with a phone, you monitor ventilation issues, while managing the battery levels of both your phone and computer. The PC serves as your lifeline to rectify the escalating ventilation problems, its power restored through a strategically placed lever within the map.

Immerse yourself in the chilling atmosphere of Runnordai, where each step could be your last. Unlock the secrets within the hospital's walls, confront your pursuer, and strive to escape this haunting nightmare. Are you ready to embrace the darkness and face the unknown?

name: Asterix & Obelix: Slap Them All! 2
description: Asterix & Obelix - Slap them all! 2 is a Beat'em Up with an original story. Explore different places such as forest ruins, a vast Roman camp and even Lutèce. This dynamic game invites you to come on an adventure — with a generous distribution of slaps!

name: Silent Hope: Day One Edition
description: The Day One Edition of Silent Hope is a physical release in a special box that comes with the base game, a 100+ page artbook titled "The Art of Silent Hope" and the games soundtrack CD with 33 songs.

name: Cube
description: Cube is a puzzle action game that can be played on a PC browser.
