name: Farming Simulator: Farm, Tractor, Experience Logic Games - Nintendo Switch Edition
description: Farmer Simulator is the ultimate combination of fun, strategy, and brain-teasing gameplay. Step into the shoes of a farmer and embark on a thinking adventure like no other.

name: Hooligan Simulator: San Gangster Andreas Fight for City, Battle Gangs, Shooter, Police
description: Do you want to become a hooligan, be respected by those around you and try any unethical way that can make you rich quickly?

name: Metal Gear Solid Master Collection: Volume 1 - Bonus Content
description: Volume 1 will feature a variety of bonus contents including the two regional versions of Metal Gear, the original version of Snake's Revenge, the first and second Digital Graphic Novels in video form, and a digital soundtrack.

name: Ramp Car Racing
description: Get behind the wheel and let the thrill begin!

name: Project Fantasy
description:
In revealing this project, IOI stated, “We are building a new world, a new IP – an online fantasy RPG. A world and a game built from the core to entertain players and expand for many years to come.”

IOI added: “For many, this journey is also a deeply personal one that began long before we started making games for a living – and it started with the fantasy genre. From the ‘Fighting Fantasy’ books compelling you to choose your path, alone, against wizards, lizards, and thief kings. To the togetherness, camaraderie, agony, and delight found around the tabletop."

“For some it meant taking the role of a game master: Part storyteller, part AI opponent, part guide, part villain. For everyone around that table it meant creativity, imagination, building a world together, and a shared goal in creating a great game experience."

“This idea – that a diverse group of individuals with different skills and strengths can work together and become more than the sum of their parts – is what inspires us. It inspires the fantasy world we are building – and it inspires how we build it.”

name: Living Books: Arthur's Teacher Trouble
description: Arthur's Teacher Trouble is based on the 1986 Marc Brown book of the same title, and is the second Living Books PC CD-Rom Game and the first of the five Arthur Living Books games (counting D.W. the Picky Eater).

name: Living Books: The New Kid on the Block
description: The New Kid on the Block is the fourth Living Books game based on the 1984 storybook written by Jack Prelutsky, and was released in 1993. Instead of just one story, it was a collection of 17 poems. It is hosted by Jack Prelutsky as he voiced the cartoon counterpart of himself.

name: Living Books: Ruff's Bone
description:
Ruff's Bone is the sixth Living Books game (or fifth if you were to go by the PC release dates) released in 1994. Written by Eli Noyes and co-produced by Colossal Pictures, it is exclusively Living Books' second original story not being an adaption from any pre-existing titles (first if not counting Mark Schlitching's adaption of The Tortoise and the Hare).

The story is about a dog named Ruff, who fetches his bone that was thrown by his master.

name: Living Books: The Berenstain Bears Get in a Fight
description: The Berenstain Bears Get in a Fight is the first Berenstain Bears interactive Living Books PC game from 1995. It is based on the 1982 book written by Stan & Jan Berenstain and its adaptation of the 1985 TV series on CBS.

name: Living Books: The Berenstain Bears in the Dark
description: "The Berenstain Bears in the Dark" is an interactive educational game based on the book of the same name. It follows Brother Bear reading a scary story to Sister Bear, leading her to fear the dark. Papa Bear helps Sister Bear realize it's just her imagination, while Brother Bear eventually becomes afraid of the dark too. The game features two play modes, "Read To Me" and "Let Me Play," as well as bonus games like "Animal Match" and "Picture Jumble."

name: Living Books: Green Eggs and Ham
description: Green Eggs and Ham is the second Dr. Seuss Living Book Adaptation from Broderbund. The story features Sam-I-Am, who repeatedly asks the questions based on an object, e.g. “Would you Could you on a boat?”. This leads to his grumpy friend saying “I do not like Green Eggs an Ham”. The story gets more dramatic as it progresses. There are some activities featuring characters from the story like the Fox in a Box, and the Mouse in the House. The game features word recognition, vocabulary, reading comprehension and computer literacy. Every page is clickable for a few surprises. In Read to Me, the program automatically turns the pages leaving out the games as the story progresses.

name: Memories of a Spy
description: Collect intel, forge documents, blend in, hunt the mole. Immerse yourself in this first-person 1960s spy simulator. Work for CIA, MI6, SDECE, BND, or KGB. Defend your country or betray it, or choose to leave it all behind to live a normal life... as long as you can.

name: Lair of the Three-Headed Hydra
description:
A tragic tale of hubris and denial.

ENTER the lair. FACE the dangers. BATTLE the hydra???

name: Hello Kitty Island Adventure
description: A cozy life sim/adventure hybrid featuring Hello Kitty and Friends. Create a unique, Sanrio-style original avatar and befriend iconic Sanrio characters like Kuromi, Badtz-Maru, Cinnamoroll, Chococat, and Aggretsuko. Share gifts, complete quests, and take part in island activities to deepen your bonds. Spruce up cabins to attract new visitors from among Hello Kitty’s many friends. Create a stylish wardrobe all your own, solve mysterious puzzles, cook delectable recipes, collect friendly critters, and fish, and explore the island solo or with a friend to unearth the many secrets of a massive in-game world.

name: Sumomo Theatre
description:
This is an action game where you defeat enemies with kicks, jumps, and special moves.
Operation during the game uses a four-way controller + 3 button.
Equipped with pause and slow motion buttons.
You can choose between 2 difficulty levels to beat the 5 stages.
There is also a game mode where you can keep killing enemies endlessly.

name: Helix Waltz

name: The Runaway Girl and Me
description:
My life has just started together with this runaway girl. She's naturally rather closed-off and suspicious of me at first, but as we communicate and spend more time together, she comes to open up to me.
Living costs money, so you'll need to work in order to save some money to fully enjoy your new cohabitation life.Complete goals to trigger events, and progress the story.
Along the way, you might find better ways of making money, too.
Have fun spending time with your new cohabitant.

name: Loonimals

Stacking them one Loonimal on top of another. But Beware! Evil bats and flyby asteroids just want to bring them down. Take out their enemies, protect your loonimals, and help them climb to stratospheric heights of joy!

name: The Password Game

Please choose a password

Absurdist puzzle game wherein the password requirements become ever more complex.

name: Lucky Birds City
description: An arcade game for iOS, where your goal is to move all the birds into their homes before the night falls. Pull the wire on which the bird sits on, and manage the flight trajectory with soft movements of your finger.

name: Mighty Beanz
description: They’re the sprites living quietly in the valleys. They’re also the fearless warriors fighting the invaders with their lives. They’re on an adventurous journey to rescue the 5 Elders and to take back their land. They are the Mighty Beanz…

Move the Box is a logic puzzle about moving boxes around. Clean the dock, do it fast!
You can move, drop and swap the boxes. Three or more boxes of the same kind in a line disappear. Watch out for turns, you only have a limited number!

description: Sin descripción

description: The final game by Softedge, and the spiritual successor to Cosmology of Kyoto, dealing with Chinese history rather than Japanese. Currently lost media, due to only being sold in museums hosting the 1999 Silk Road Journey To The West exhibition.

name: Meet Your Maker: Sector 1 Cosmetic Collection

description: Meet Your Maker's Sector 1 Arsenal Pack expands your toolbox with 4 vicious implements of death including a new trap, guard, Custodian, and weapon. Master these lethal additions and make sure no Raider survives your next creation.

description: Immerse yourself in the world of retro-games as a roller robot. From platformers and side-scrollers, to the legendary Arkanoid, Xonix, Digger and Snake. Jump across platforms and fight glitch bosses. Colorful graphics, effects galore, and chiptune music. Anyone but a robot would cry from nostalgia!

Included as a bonus disc in the Japanese My Next Life as a Villainess: All Routes Lead to Doom! Blu-ray Package Vol 1.

A original Mini PC Game included in the Blu-ray releases of the My Next life as a Villainess: All Routes Lead to Doom! as a bonus disc. Each disc contains a 15-30 minute trial game, showing a preview of the events within the world of the original game.

name: Cars
description: Sin descripción

A original Mini PC Game included in the Blu-ray releases of the My Next life as a Villainess: All Routes Lead to Doom! as a bonus disc. Each disc contains a 15-30 minute trial game, showing a preview of the events within the world of the original game.

A original Mini PC Game included in the Blu-ray releases of the My Next life as a Villainess: All Routes Lead to Doom! as a bonus disc. Each disc contains a 15-30 minute trial game, showing a preview of the events within the world of the original game.

name: Room Map
description:
rooms in room

Room Map is a game where you explore progressively denser rooms inside an apartment that's inside another apartment.

name: Super Lava Bros.
description: Super Lava Bros. is a rom hack for Super Mario Bros. which removes the floor and replaces it with lava.

name: R&Dy
description:
Little Alchemy meets Factorio in this genre-bending relaxing collectathon sandbox!

(Made for the Big Festive Game Jam 2022)

name: Princess to Be
description:
Mobile otome game developed by Dearead and published by Whomor.

Now included in the Story Me: Interactive Episode app.

name: The Legendary Love Story
description:
Now included in the Otome Games Romance Box.

You who have one side as an adventurer while being a Duke's daughter, and being the fiance of the prince.
While the nightmare is being real step by step, your choice is…

name: The Fateful Saint’s Love
description: Now included in the "Otome games Romance Box" app.

name: Monster’s First Love
description: A otome game developed by Dearead. Now included in the Otome Games Romance Box app.

name: Super Luigi! The Forgotten Adventure!
description: Here’s a chapter in Luigi’s life he never spoke about, saving Peach from a robotic creature. Luigi travels through three worlds in order to save Peach, can he do it? Only with your help.

name: Cafe ma Cherie: Otome of Ikemen Cafe
description:
Otome game by Dearead, originally released in 2017.

Now available in the Otome games Romance Box app.

name: Amairo Chocolate 2
description: Yunagicho, a town lined with Western-style homes. The previous autumn was when Yuzuki came to this town and met the animal eared girls and started working with them at Cafe Setaria.

name: Love Ice Rink
description:
Originally released in 2017.

A perfect prince, an underachieving genius, a kinky coach...

Which ikemen ice skater will you pair up with?

Now included in the Otome Games Romance Box app.

name: Prince of the Resort
description:
Otome game by Dearead.

Prince of the Resort - Love simulation otome game for women

name: Sports 5
description: Sports 5 is an unreleased unlicensed sports compilation game for the Sega Genesis and SNES. It was being developed by FarSight Technologies and was set to be published by Active Enterprises.

name: Together in the Sky
description:
"A big-brother type captain, a four-eyed mechanical engineer, a gentle bodyguard and a nasty chef… The unique crew of the airship is badly injured!

They're about to sail off once again, but as a doctor, you can't let that happen!"

Available in the Otome Games Romance Box app.

name: A.I. A New Kind of Love
description:
Otome game by Dearead.

Available in the Otome Games Romance Box app.

name: Cleopatra Fortune Plus
description: Cleopatra Fortune Plus is an Egyptian themed falling block puzzle game following Cleopatra Fortune. Expanding on the original, blocks can be rotated counter-clockwise, breaking colored gems builds up items with powerful effects when cleared, and a rival that can drop larger blocks appears. In addition, a story mode is present unlike the original.

name: First Page of Love
description: Otome game by Dearead avaliable in the Otome Games Romance Box app.

name: Otome Games Romance Box
description: Collection of all Dearead's otome games in one app.

name: Drop Wizard Tower
description: Drop Wizard Tower is a follow up to Neutronized's previous release, Drop Wizard. The player controls one of a group of wizards that must ascend the tower to defeat the Shadow Order.

name: Rich Maser: Cash King
description: Rich Master is a casual mobile game that combines the excitement of collecting and trading with the thrill of building and developing your own village. The goal is to collect as many coins as possible and use them to upgrade your village, build new structures, and compete against other players in game challenges.

name: Friendship21s
description: Friendship Game which designed for Society. Improve potentiality, Mental goodness, Public Awareness and Confident to change the bad things to good things

name: Guilty Gear: Strive - Season Pass 1
description: The first Season Pass for Guilty Gear Strive includes 5 characters, 2 stages, the exclusive story expansion called Another Story and a color pack that adds 5 color variations for the base roster of 15 characters along with the 5 new characters in this pass.

name: Guilty Gear: Strive + Season Pass 1
description:
This bundle includes the base game Guilty Gear Strive and it;s first Season Pass which adds 5 characters, 2 stages, the exclusive story expansion called Another Story and a color pack that adds 5 color variations for the 20 characters available with this package.

Original released as the Deluxe Edition for Guilty Gear Strive, this bundle was renamed along with a price change and the announcement of a new bundle, Ultimate Edition 2022.
Delisted on August 24th, 2023 with the release of Season Pass 3 and the Daredevil Edition

name: Guilty Gear: Strive - Additional Character Color Pack 2
description: An additional color pack including 6 colors for the 4 additional characters of GGST Season 2 (total of 24 colors).

name: Guilty Gear: Strive - Season Pass 2
description: Season Pass 2 includes 4 characters, 2 stages and a color pack with 6 variations for the new characters.

name: Starwulf: Seeker of Secret Space
description:
Venture into the cosmos in this unique, multi-genre space combat game. Take control of your own spaceship, shooting bricks to shatter asteroids and solve intricate puzzles. As you journey further from your home star system, the challenges grow, testing your reflexes, strategic thinking, and adaptability.

Uncover the secrets of the universe, upgrade your ship, and uncover the legendary spaceship to save your home planet. With its blend of arcade action, brain-teasing puzzles, and captivating narrative, this game offers an unforgettable space odyssey. Can you rise to the challenge and become the hero the universe needs?

name: Pegasus II
description: Introducing Pegasus II, a captivating variation of the classic Scramble game. Prepare for an exhilarating side-scrolling shoot 'em up experience as you navigate your ship across a majestic mountainous terrain. Engage in intense combat by strategically dropping bombs to obliterate enemy installations on the ground, while skillfully shooting down rockets with your ship's laser beams. Be prepared for aerial adversaries like birds, saucers, and dragons that emerge as you progress through the game. Remember, any contact with enemies or the ground results in a lost life, and you begin with five lives.

name: Living Books: The Cat in the Hat
description: The Cat in the Hat is an educational game based on the Dr. Seuss book of the same name. It has the same plot of the original book. The Cat sees that Sally and her brother are bored on a rainy day. Eventually, they start having fun, but The Cat realizes he has made a big mess. The Cat uses a big vacuum to clean the whole mess up, and it ends happily ever after. The game lets you click on many things in the background, and has small mini-games during the story. The game also lets you go back to any page you want again.

name: B.O.T.S.S.: Battle of the Solar System
description: Sin descripción

name: Trapped Girls
description:
Come rescue the girls who are caught in various cruel traps set up inside a mansion.

Rescuing everyone is a very difficult task - and not in the sense that the puzzles are difficult to solve. Rather, doing so will be hard on your soul.

Can you discover the truth among the five different endings?

name: Sludge Life: The Big Mud Sessions
description: Chop it up with BIG MUD and crew to get small glimpse of what went down prior to the events of SLUDGE LIFE 2.

name: Rocket Chicken
description: This game is a parody on another popular game! Have you ever wondered how hard would it be for a chicken to escape from the chicken factory? No? Never mind, take a shot! This chicken is like no other chicken on the farm, she has decided to run away, and she’s gonna do it, with the rocket or without it! Don’t avoid the bomb, just jump on it to run even further!

name: Sad Robot
description: An arcade game where you control a robot flying through space. You collect coins, avoid obstacles, and sometimes you can gain a power-up to aid you. The coins can be used to purchase new robots, upgrade the power-ups and buy items to start the next game with.

name: Siege Hero
description: Siege Hero is an Angry Birds-style physics puzzle game in which the player has to destroy buildings to kill bad guys using as few throws as possible. At the same time, the player must make sure that the peasants or maidens remain unharmed.

name: Skeeter
description:
Save yourself from the swarm of skeeters rising up from the deserted wastelands! Use power-ups to survive as long as you can! Achievements and high scores await.
Tap each skeeter as they fly on screen. If they land they will start to drain your life. The longer you last the more skeeters will find you.
Use multi-touch to fend off the hordes and collect power-ups. Once you have a power-up in your dashboard tap it to unleash its power.

name: Drinlan Yellow
description: A short adventure of five dreams, each different from the rest. Explore them to face your past and your nightmares. Accept the ritual and open your eyes.

name: Sakura Apprentice
description: Sakura Apprentice is a fantasy story set in the land of Elodia. The protagonist, Riven, is training in the capital to be a knight, under the tutelage of the stern and serious Alma. While training, however, he happens to catch the eye of Elodia’s most famous knight – the undefeated, impossibly beautiful Freyja.

name: Wild Boater
description: Sin descripción

name: The Lécuyer Cult
description:
You are a 21-year-old young man who receives an invitation to go to the Lécuyer mansion to find your missing friend. You head to the mansion where a cultured ceremony is taking place. You realize that you are about to experience a whole new world.
You walk through the corridors of the mansion that has been owned by the Lécuyers for several years now. You will learn the history of each character and decide whether you want to help them or not.
You will learn dark secrets and if you do it right, you will be able to enjoy the girls who are in the mansion.

name: Fortnite: Triarch Nox Crew Pack
description:
The cosmetics included in April's pack have now been sent to the lockers of all Fortnite Crew members, with the option to purchase it available through the in-game Battle Pass tab to those who are not currently subscribed.

The latest Crew Pack includes:

Triarch Nox Outfit
Midnight Aegis Back Bling
Starlit Sai Pickaxe
Noxious Wrap
Photonic Legacy Pickaxe
Chapter 4, Season 2 Battle Pass (or 950 V-Bucks)
1,000 V-Bucks

name: Two Slices of Love
description:
One night you get a call, your hot girlfriend has just decided to move into your apartment.
That sounds great! But she's not coming alone, her younger sister is coming with her.
Now you have the chance to live with not just one beautiful girl, but two!
But not everything is going to be so simple.
Sister rivalry is growing day by day and you have no idea why.
Each of the girls keeps her own secrets.
As their advances become more aggressive and their desires more uncontrollable,
it's up to you to restore peace to your home, control your feelings and order pizza for dinner.​

name: Cardania: Epoch Wars
description: Epoch Wars is a live multiplayer strategy game with hundreds of players from around the world. Battle for strategic resources, explore mysterious anomalies, earn EXP and Victory Points for yourself and one of 7 unique Factions, all vying for control of Cardania! Experience a dynamic, shifting map which provides players with a totally fresh experience every 5 days (called an Epoch). Epoch wars utilizes the latest in fast and secure blockchain + NFT technology, so players truly own their lands, cards, and battle units!

name: The Secret Ingredient is...
description:
On his unyielding quest for employment, the MC picks up an odd job request at the townsboard from the local alchemist.

A straightforward, kinetic novel made with Ren'Py and a version of Skyrim SE, heavily modded for the creation of novels such as this one.
The game is not necessarily intended to take place in the world of The Elder Scrolls, so having played Skyrim is not required to understand the plot.
It features a few choices for dialogue variety but they do not alter the overall story, hence the kinetic novel tag.
It's primarily intended to be a one-shot story, with some light humor and romance elements.

name: Okashi Towers
description: Okashi Towers is a Halloween inspired Real Time Strategy game with Tower Defense elements. Gather candy resources to build tower units or go on offense and summon cute creatures to attack other player bases. Join with up to 8 players and choose one of the four factions that fits your play style best

name: Enigmas da Escuridão
description:
Game creates a society that fights the Obscures, people who work in the dark to create chaos in the cities of the world and you as a mystery hunter will unravel several enigmas to stop these evil events of the Obscures.

This first riddle and you're trapped in a dream that never ends and only you can crack this mystery!

name: Biomes
description: A massively-multiplay world where players work together to build, farm, fish, and solve puzzles to fight back against the infectious Muck.

name: March of the Drunken Sailors
description:
Defend the sea from the menace of these sailors, who wish for nothing more than to embark on another fishing trip. Unite the denizens of the sea to stop the coming menace before they can reach their vessel.

There are no health bars or damage numbers here, only mass. Instead of defeating an enemy through traditional means, you’ll need to push and pull your foes off the dock and into the sea to stop them from setting off to fish the sea once again.

name: Lego Batman 3: Beyond Gotham Rainbow Character Pack
description: Rainbow Batman’s costume, armed with an array of Bat-Gadgets, is so bright! Rainbow Raider is an artist turned evil who projects beams of brilliant light to seriously damage heroes. These two colorful characters bring vibrant chaos to LEGO Batman 3!

name: Rox III
description: Sin descripción

name: Nibble: Pizza Delivery
description: Nibble: Pizza Delivery is an open-source pizza delivery game created in nine days for Game Jaaj 3.

name: Elemix!
description: Elemix! is an Adventure game, developed and published by SIMS, which was released in Japan in 2003.

name: Bug: Beetles Underground
description: Bug: Beetles Underground is an open-world adventure game created in nine days for Game Jaaj 6, where you live in the life cycle of beetles known as true dung beetles - walk, roll, climb, fly, do quests, race, and upgrade.

name: Etcetera
description: Etcetera is a Yume Nikki fangame. You are "Innard". You must return a lost pistol to "Etcetera". You need to find him.

name: Photo Spot
description:
Photo Spot: Global Challenge takes the classic touch screen “spot the difference” game to your iPhone and iPod Touch!
Can you identify all 4 differences in the photos before the countdown timer runs out? With just three `hints` to help you survive the countdown, challenge yourself to earn a position in the global high score chart.

name: Logic Master Detective 3
description: Detective Morgan is back with 50 new logic puzzles for you to master.

name: Toy Swipe
description:
Winner of second place in Buildbox Game Jam.
Santa spilled his sack of presents all over the room.
One last toy needs to find it's way under the tree.
Swipe the toys and clear it's path to the gift box.
Enjoy Toy Swipe this Holiday season.

name: Flappy Brolly
description:
A easy get started shooting game, one-handed operation, shot +1 points, while miss the target -1 point, the difficulty level will be incremental.
Each scene has a random background and music, with the rumble of cannon, have some relaxed leisure time.

name: Bubbles Popper 2
description:
Destroy as many bubbles as possible to move to the next level.
Select group of 2 or more same colored bubbles and they will disappear adding point to you.
Number of point for each removed bubble depends on number of bubbles in the removed group.

name: Cat Raid
description:
Defend the Earth from the attack of huge cats from outer space!
Bounce the flying cats by using a trampoline.

name: Hexa Knot
description:
Simple, minimalistic puzzle game.
Relax with simple rules. Your goal is to swap hexes to make colorful knots.
Small levels are easy, but larger will challenge your patience and perception.

name: Link Track
description:
"Link Track" is a very interesting puzzle game.
This game provides two type of puzzle modes: Color Link mode and Number Track mode. Each mode corresponds to a unique puzzle mechanism.

name: Tides of Despair
description: After a shipwreck, you are one of the survivors. To Survive you will need to fight for your life.

name: Jigsaw Puzzle Pack: Pixel Puzzles Ultimate - Fitness
description: Pixel Puzzles Ultimate, redefining digital puzzling.

name: The Pit
description: The Pit is a 2D pixel platformer with precise jumps, coin collecting and enemy encounters accompanied by a dark atmosphere and soundtrack. One or more missed moves can cost everything. Man up and defeat the evil!

name: Tetrageddon Games
description: Tetrageddon is what the internet does to people. Bring the internet to your desktop with stunning 8-bit graphics, monkeys, and a mild lack of self respect that games can be proud of today.

name: Small Tank
description: This is a classic retro 2.5D tank battle game. Familiar gameplay and simple operations allow players to control their tanks and engage in shooting battles with other tanks in the game, requiring them to be completely eliminated. Of course, when eliminating enemy tanks,

name: Secret Pie: Hidden Room
description: Secret Pie DLC Hidden Room~!

name: Prediction Game
description: It's a game to predict what it will say by looking at pictures and names.

name: Munchkin Digital: Unnatural Axe
description: Munchkin: Unnatural Axe shuffles up 112 new cards to help you kill monsters and take their stuff.

name: Let's Bounce! Popsicle Boy!
description: Help little boy Toto sell more Popsicles with the Popsicle Bouncer in this challenging NES/FC-inspired retro action game. Challenge various funny themes and difficult levels to earn more coins!

name: Granny Remake
description: "Granny Remake" is a scary horror game where you must escape from a sinister Granny. Test your wits, stealth, and survival skills in an intense, immersive experience. Navigate through a terrifying environment, feeling the suspense at every step.

name: Farming Simulator 22: Premium Expansion
description: Get a new map, perfect for the three new crops: carrots, parsnips, & red beet. Including 35+ specialized machines by series debutants Dewulf, Gorenc, Agrio & WIFO & more.

name: Family Adventure
description: This game in unique. It has beautiful texts. It has nice talks. You play 4 different characters which are family members. You enbark on a journey together as a family. Game has 41 quests. We are adding more.

name: 100% Orange Juice: Waruda Prison Break Pack
description: This Extra Character Pack adds 2 new playable characters - the tough cookie Mimyuu (Jailbird) and her trusted partner, the somnolent Krilalaris (Pajamas) whose dark aura is sealed into her haunted dreams. The new characters come with announcer voices and have their own campaign!

name: 15 Minutes Dungeon
description: Can you beat the dungeon in 15 minutes? Roguelike + RTA.

name: Dungeon Defenders: Hermit Hero
description: The Hermit joins the heroes of Etheria! Harness the elements to take on the Old One's army!

name: Bounty Hunting Time
description: At a tavern It is where adventurers come together to form a team to hunt for the bounty of monsters that are dangerous to humans. This is an Action Roguelite game where you build a team and develop a character that people like to swarm with monsters that will flock to your team to crush …or not

name: Cut WallStreet2
description: Sin descripción

name: Plekos
description: Plekos is a fresh take on the popular Coin Soccer game, played on a wooden board with nails representing the players and a coin by way of a ball. In this version, the coin has been replaced by a bottle cap, and you can play against the computer, or have your own Cup championship, with up to eight players offline on the same device.

name: 3D Water Bike
description: Feel like a rider on a water scooter. You are taking part in the global competition of the best drivers on the water scooter (clarification: a scooter that is in water) and your task is to get the title of the best in the world.

name: Motocross Mini Outrun
description:
Out run the cops, collect cash and unlock new Cool Mini Motocross Bikes.
All bikes have different power and handling control.

name: Bike Trials Offroad 2
description: We know that you're going to ask for another one so here we are again for another part of Bike Trials: Offroad! If you ain't challenged on the first one, this second part is going to blow your mind! From crates, rocks, logs and other crazy platforms plus plenty of mine bombs! It's going to be an explosive drive that will make your adrenaline pumping!

name: Curfuffles
description:
Play the fastest, funnest, truly unique word puzzle game!
With 44 Different Languages to choose from, play, and learn!
Take on dozens of surprising levels in the Main Mode - from Lightning to Lighthouse and so much more! Fly through the solar system and find rare and unusual items and planets in Space Mode. Collect over 75 unique Birds, Flowers, and Sea Creatures in Curfuffles Mode! Discover the secrets of the game as you go, with infinite lives!

name: Switch Sides 2: Sea Sandwich
description: The mercat is hungry! Guide him by switching sides to feed him those lovely sandwiches!

name: Mecha Kucha Gacha Defence
description: Try your luck! Mecha Kucha Gacha Defense is a pixel gacha defense game. It is a game to smash enemies by summoning units through gacha. If you think you're running out of luck, get more units with more payments(free)!

name: Mister Smith & His Adventures
description:
The action-packed comedy adventures of Mister Smith, where you select your path!
Make your way through interactive comedy plots in Mister Smith & His Adventures where you decide how the adventure ends. Be clever or dumb, kind or evil, logical or insane – the choices are yours and each outcome is unique! Which is more important: your phone or your date? Who would you save: yourself or your cat? What is the capital of France? Oh yes - as well as the storylines there are trivia quizzes! Everybody loves quizzes!

name: Racing Combat
description: Racing Combat is super fun multiplayer racing battle game. Are you a hero racing fighter for your top position? than let's clash with real opponents worldwide or with your friends. Win races to discover new awesome cars & power cards. Upgrade your power drivers to defeat other traffic rider in real-time. Form Gadgets to Weapons to Spells, Racing Combat has dozens of cards to load in your combat deck. Win Trophies and Chests to lead your path to victories!

name: Purrfect Catch
description:
The Dogs need your help! Work together with your feline companion to save the dogs across all manner of magical levels!
A cat-astrophe has occurred, giving the dogs an unwanted bath. Band together with your Cat and Rod and bring them back to dry land. Customise your equipment using the Locker Room, and use unique perks to save more dogs than ever before - and don't forget to go for the high score.

name: WorMoon: Awakening
description:
Embark on an epic journey in worMoon Awakening - A fast paced card battle game with some RPG and innovative roguelite mechanics to create a simple, fun and replayable game.
Build your deck of nine cards by combining the power of your team of heroes. Unleash the forces of nature with Bo, wield powerful magic with Ash, and uncover the enigmatic hero Jomei's secrets.

name: WarShip War Navy Fleet Combat
description:
Warship War – Navy Fleet Combat is the best game allowing you to experience the famous naval battles of the Second World War.
You can be an admiral of a navy fleet and lead numerous battleships, aircraft carriers, destroyers, submarines, and gun ships, which are made based on a thorough historical research.

name: Tiny Pirate Ship
description: Ahoy, fearless seafarer! Prepare to embark on a thrilling voyage of vengeance like never before! Welcome to Tiny Pirate Ship the ultimate game where you take command of a pirate ship, engage in epic ship-to-ship battles, and embark on a treacherous quest to collect loot, all in your pursuit of retribution against the mighty Kraken!

name: Teeny Tiny Town
description:
Welcome to Teeny Tiny Town, where you can indulge your inner city planer and craft your very own bustling city! Merge, build, and watch your town flourish before your eyes.

In this captivating puzzle game, your objective is to combine three or more items on the board to construct new structures. Start with humble trees and transform them into majestic houses, and then merge those houses to create even grander residences! Unleash your creativity and witness your town grow exponentially.
As your city thrives, collect gold from your houses to unlock and acquire new items, expanding your options for development. Strategically manage your resources to maximize your town's potential.

name: Teenage Crush Love Story Games
description: Hello, teenagers! Are you ready for an awesome love story adventure? Are you looking for high school games with high school love storyline? Are you willing to help an attractive heroine win the heart of the boy she likes?

name: Trade Mania 2
description:
Play a sequel of this amazing economic strategy game, combining the best features of economic board games with realistic settings in the world’s most fascinating great cities.
The new game has incorporated most of the suggestions received from players. It features more dynamic gameplay, sophisticated virtual competitors, and a great variety of strategic solutions.

name: Super Contraption 3D
description:
Super Contraption 3D is a database driven 3D physics sandbox game with powerful capabilities.
This is not for everyone! The building process can be complicated. Only people who want to tinker around in a physics sandbox should try this.
Since this is a physics simulation game it should be played on a relatively modern device, preferably plugged into power.

name: MiniPix Jump
description:
Prevent your character from falling and go as high as possible in this fun, easy to handle and very, very addictive game.
 Unlock more than a hundred characters! Don’t forget to collect coins and take care of the obstacles that will be on your way...

name: Little Helper of the House Kitchen
description:
'Little Helper of the House' game series are taking place in the rooms and in the living places of our big house. 2 heroes of our cute family are wearing their little helper aprons and learning how to do the houseworks by helping their parents with fun.
In this episode of our series of “little helper of the house”, we have academically and socially designed the game aiming a solid improvement and provide support in the learning curve of our pre-elementary level children by experiencing everyday duties and bonding with their parents in achieving them.

name: Last Walpurgis
description:
Last Walpurgis is a tower defense battle game in which you collect witches scattered around the world to fight against humans.
Tower defense type battles involve over hundreds of dot characters. Each character fights on its own initiative, but you can also activate powerful Ultimate Skills at your command.

name: Keep Combo
description: In the year of 2009, A Jump game let mobile phone casual games be popular. Ten yeas past, though hip an hop games seem to be out of date, I still have a fondness for hip and hop games. With this specil affection, I make a game, KEEP COMBO, to pay my respects to all casual games which had touched my heart, also to pay my respects to the palyers and gameplatforms at that time.

name: JeweLife: Match 3 Jewels
description: JeweLife is a match 3 puzzle with fantastic Relaxing Mode and stunning visual and sound effects!

name: Gravity Golfing
description:
Infinite golfing in a universe where gravity changes when your ball hits a wall.

Gravity golfing is a casual golfing game. Hit a wall to change gravity and shoot your ball in the hole.

name: Geometra - Join the Colors
description:
Geometra ...
... is tricky
...it's fun
...is addicting
... will drive you out of your boredom!
Play now Geometra and combine objects of the same color to create a new high score.

name: Dragonstone: Kingdoms
description: Will you send your heroes on new quests or raise armies to march against your friends or will you lead your Guild to ultimate victory over the millions of other players online? In the world of Dragonstone your options are endless!

name: Difference Games
description: Each level is comprised of two images which contain subtle differences. Don't worry though, if things get too hard you can touch the hint button to get a nudge in the right direction.

name: Devil Ninja Fight: Kungfu combat
description: Devil Ninja Fight is a Fast paced and super addictive ninja game.In this face paced fighting game,your goal is to kill enemies and Monster on the devil's land. And there are various props to increase your combat effectiveness.

name: Casino Resort
description: Casino Resort is a mobile social online multiplayer casino game from the Japanese game developer and publishing giant, Colopl. Have fun building and managing your own casino resort while checking out the casino games!

name: Blocks Racing
description:
Blocks Racing is classic kart racing game madness. Speed your way through 55 unique tracks equipped with shortcuts for advantage. Unlock new racers with varying stats based on the vehicle design.
Collect power-ups to use weapons like missiles or shield boost for competitive advantage against other rival racers. Blocks will fall off the race karts when damaged and eventually break apart. Can you survive and race to the finish line?

name: Basketball Simulator
description:
See if you have what it takes to lead a basketball team to glory by testing out your coaching skills with Geeked-Out Basketball!
Use your knowledge of strategy and tactics to get your players performing on the court, while also keeping the locker room on your side and building chemistry within your team.
Your dreams of becoming a top basketball coach have never been closer to reality. All you need is right at your fingertips.

name: Anime Sniper
description:
Anime Sniper is a sniper shooting game with anime girls from "Shoujo City" dating simulator.
To fight the alien invasion of Tokyo, Laika, Anette, and Yumi join an elite sniper team and must train their shooting skills by going through progressively more difficult missions.

name: Daddy Moto Racing
description:
Dare to drive through the traffic in Daddy Racing Moto
Drive the fast motorbikes between the traffic, collect coins, obtain the highest speed with the nitro and make the highest scores in the exciting Daddy Moto Racing game.
